Text.Value: When you gaze long into the abyss the abyss also gazes into you.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext:
The eyes of the insignia of Bhaal at the back of the temple light up, glowering over you and Orin.
[MK] MCU Player reacts, then glances down to see Orin on altar playing with the dagger "...into the abyss..", 
Orin looks up locking eyes with player after/on line "...the abyss also gazes into you"
EditorData.NodeContext: This is the second intro line from baldur's gate 1, if anything is a time-honoured truth espoused by the Butler, it's this.

EditorData.stateContext: Orin in Slayer form stepping on player pinning them down

Text.Value: *There is another. The abomination wrapped in flesh you saw in the colony. Orin.*
*By eradicating your siblings.*
And that other will be your death.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext:
Orin becomes the slayer.
[MK] - frame in as they square off against eachother. Cut to DU as they become slayer form

Text.Value: Another will embrace what you have rejected.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext:
The Orin's body starts to transform, once Bhaal's icon has lit up.
[MK] - Orin rolls/spins off the altar, raising dagger to player.

Text.Value: *You are not the last of your name. Not yet.*

EditorData.stateContext: Player  in Slayer form stepping on Orin pinning her down

Text.Value: You have disobeyed your Father's wishes one time too many.

EditorData.AnimationTags: *REUSE*[PLAYER] approaches the altar., *REUSE*[ORIN] beckons the player closer.<CodyM>
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext:
Orin beckons the DU closer.The Dark Urge approaches the altar.
[MK] - DU eyes lock onto something high off screen.

Text.Value: But another seeks to disinherit you. Do not let her be your death.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext:
The Dark Urge becomes the Slayer
[MK] - frame in as they square off against eachother. Cut to DU as they become slayer form

Text.Value: *Memories flood back - snatches of your story, written in the blood of a thousand victims.*

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: The Dark Urge wakes up from their dream and is back in camp

Text.Value: Lord Bhaal shall have but one Chosen.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: [MK] - end snarl from previous shot. Profile shot framing Slayer top left and Orin lower right. alien queen-esque Faceoff. With Bhall insignia blasing behind them.

Text.Value: Triumph after triumph, you have excelled in base villainy.

EditorData.AnimationTags: [PLAYER] approaches the altar., [ORIN] beckons the player closer.<CodyM>
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext:
Orin beckons the DU closer.The Dark Urge approaches the altar.
[MK] - Player wakes, sits up into focus and is confronted by the image of the temple. Slowly stands up while looking around. End of shot their eyes lock onto something high off screen.

Text.Value: There was much disappointment at your reluctance to kill the little Moonmaiden.
*All is as you feared. You are a spawn of Bhaal - his heir, his scion.*

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Player sits up, still reeling

Text.Value: Revel in the memories of murder.
*It's time to go home.*
Slaughter your line. Become the last of your name.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: [MK] - CU/OTS looking at DU slayer, menacing. Cut on snarl

Text.Value: *Your heart pines for the love of your Lord.*
Naughty, naughty, naughty, little Master.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext:
The Dark Urge awakens in the Bhaal Temple. The Butler speaks to them as the narrator, just for this dream.
[MK] - Player wakes, sits up into focus and is confronted by the image of the temple. Slowly stands up while looking around.

EditorData.stateContext: Player sitting on their camp roll

Text.Value: *Today is a wonderful day for murder.*

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Dark Urge will always transform back into normal form in gameplay the second this cutscene is over.

Text.Value: *And yet you know you will never be free of your Urge if you don't confront your past.*
For he who fights with monsters should look to it that he himself becomes a monster.
For she who fights with monsters should look to it that she herself becomes a monster.
For one who fights with monsters should look to it that they themselves become a monster.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: [MK] - Push in on insignia of Bhaal skull to show what player is looking at... On dialogue "becomes a monster" the eyes burst into flames casting light
EditorData.NodeContext: This is the original intro line from Baldur's Gate 1 - great emphasis should be placed upon it.

Text.Value: Surrender to the Urge. Perhaps it is time to embrace your heritage.
Your inheritance of your estate depends on you maintaining a healthy stream of kills.
Shudder. This has gone too far.
*Dear sister must die by your hand, an offering in Bhaal's sanctum.*
Your Father loves you best. You have already made us so proud.

EditorData.AnimationTags: [SLAYER] steps on [ORIN], entering an Idle. <CodyM: Can retarget Player's animation to Orin for the alternate branch.>
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: The Dark Urge steps on Orin while they are in slayer form. Orin snarls, and protests.

Text.Value: *If you want to be free of your Urge, you must confront your past.*
Slaughter your line. Become the last of your name.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: [MK] - CU/OTS looking at DU slayer, menacing. Cut on snarl
Players are in CTY_Main_A

Text.Value: *It's time for a family reunion.*
Naughty, naughty, naughty, little Master.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: The Dark Urge awakens in the Bhaal Temple. The Butler speaks to them as the narrator, just for this dream.

Text.Value: *The cruelty of the Slayer leaps around within.*

EditorData.stateContext: The Bhaal temple altar is a gory mess. Orin awaits the Dark Urge right in front of the icon of Bhaal's face. The Dark Urge awoke on the other side, and Orin beckons them closer.

Text.Value: Recall that there was another - the woman beneath your feet.
All those deaths by your hand. How can you ever atone?
Tonight, you are the monster everyone claims you are.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: The Dark Urge awakens in the Bhaal Temple. The Butler speaks to them as the narrator, just for this dream.

Text.Value: But your Father loves you dearly. You may reinherit yourself yet.

EditorData.AnimationTags: *REUSE*[SLAYER] steps on [PLAYER], entering an Idle. <CodyM: Can retarget Player's animation to Orin for the alternate branch.>
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Slayer Orin steps on the Dark Urge, threatening them.

Text.Value: Recall that there was another - the woman who became the Slayer.
*You were their Master, and he was yours. A cruel Master, a Dread Lord... a devoted Father.*
Tense up. That may be what you were, but it is not who you are.
*Years spent in worship of Bhaal, leading his savage congregation in prayer, sacrifice, and slaughter.*
You have reached the time of majority, and you shall come into your birthright.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext:
The Dark Urge's body starts to transform, once Bhaal's icon has lit up.
[MK] - Orin rolls/spins off the altar, raising dagger to player.
Players are in CTY_Main_A

Text.Value: *All is greater than you could have dreamed. You are a spawn of Bhaal - his heir, his scion.*

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Player sits up, still reeling

EditorData.stateContext: The Dark Urge wakes up from their dream and is back in camp

Text.Value: *But be wary of your confessors. Will friend turn to foe, knowing what you are?*
*This is the truth lost in your mangled memories. You are a spawn of Bhaal - his heir, his scion.*

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Player sits up, still reeling

Text.Value: Hee hee hmm hmm hmm.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Dark Urge stumbles and falls in the middle of the road; fade to red. Hears the butler giggling as they collapse.

Text.Value: Lord Bhaal shall have but one Chosen.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: [MK] - end snarl from previous shot. Profile shot framing Slayer top left and Orin lower right. alien queen-esque Faceoff. With Bhall insignia blasing behind them.

Synopsis:
The Dark Urge sees themselves and Orin in the Bhaal temple. Only one of them is given the Slayer form. The Butler of Bhaal is not present, but is the one giving the voiceover and information about what is happening. The icon of Bhaal looms over all. We see spectres of those we have had to kill, if we were on the Embracing track.
If we turn into the Slayer, it should automatically start the dialogue after this with Jaheira, if present, talking about the Slayer.
